title: Pan and Pinch gestures bad performance in Forms UWP
body:
Hi!
I tested Pich and Pan gestures from sample project in Forms/UWP app and it's slow. When dragging image from BitmapScale sample it doesn't move smoothly, especially when drag distance is large. In OpenGL backed gestures don't work at all. Tested on Lumia 950 (not XL), SkiaSharp 1.56-2 (latest from nuget, I had to downgrade from 1.57 used in sample project).

Regards,
Marcin
